alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:54PM CDT until July 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PIKE...CENTRAL BULLOCK AND SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 854 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Aberfoil to 6 miles southeast of Pine Level, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Union Springs, Pickett, Pine Level, Aberfoil, Franklin Field, Beans Crossroads, Linwood, Shopton, High Ridge, Orion, Perote, China Grove, Currys and Simsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
